QuestData.Title: Guaranteed Delivery
QuestData.Description:
<The broker appears to be from Cartel Ve. Perhaps they were once an associate of Ve'nari.
Clutched in their hand is a list of items and a containment orb.
Finishing this broker's task and sending the items back to Ve'nari will surely earn you some compensation.>
QuestData.LogDescription:
Use the Containment Orb to send $1oa Imprisoned Essences to Ve'nari.
Suggested Players [3]
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Ve'nari at Ve'nari's Refuge.
QuestData.RewardText:
Excellent, $p. I wondered what had become of that particular associate.
It pleases me to know that their demise was not a complete loss.
